inclusion.criterion: Diagnosis of acute pancreatitis confirmed by revised Atlanta criteria
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Cross-sectional imaging was negative for obstructive pancreatitis.

inclusion.criterion: Admitted to the medical floor within 48 hours of emergency department arrival at Beth Israel Deaconess Medical Center (BIDMC) in Boston, Massachusetts.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Direct admission to ICU from emergency department
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient is a 57-year-old man with abdominal pain and vomiting. He drinks around 60 units of alcohol per week and smokes 22 cigarettes per day.
